name: 8P - 8x8 FPS
description:
8P is the first ever FPS game that runs at 8x8 resolution

Walk through a colorful maze

Shoot enemies

Find golden pieces

Find keys

Find a better weapon

Destroy walls

Avoid mines

Read creepy text on walls

And uncover a disturbing story

Controls:

Movement - WASD + mouse

Shoot - LMB

Interact - E

The game randomizes your starting position whenever you start over

A 16x16 version is also available
